title: Ducted Unit
description1: The ducted air conditioning from Naitec is a discreet and efficient solution for your home or office. With its invisible placement and smart control systems, it provides optimal conditions without interfering with the aesthetics of your interior.
description2: The ducted air conditioning is built into the ceiling or floor, and its outputs are hidden behind ventilation grilles, ensuring even cooling of the entire room while preserving the cleanliness of your interior.
